mapper.insert: insert into room_image(roomcode, fileName, uploadPath, uuid) values (#{roomcode}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: select r1.roomcode,type,id,title,roompw,member_cnt,join_member_cnt,explanation,fileName,uploadPath,uuid from (room r1 join roomdetail r2 on r1.roomcode = r2.roomcode) join room_image r3 on r1.roomcode = r3.roomcode order by roomcode desc
